lg.l: There’s a picture on the wall with a sad boy doing nothing at all
There he stands, so all alone, doing nothing, oh
In the winter, he'll be alive if the painter will stop wasting time
In his naked eyes one could see all the sorrow, oh
Standing in the wood gazing at the trees, looks so fragile
In the winter, he’ll be alive, wake up painter! Come draw a line
Sorry girl, I left you alone, im a sad boy, wont harm you at all
Stay with me, its much nicer here, we will fly on the back of a sound
On the back of a sound
